markup.value:
Meant for business:

Site templates include marketing sites, support sites, self-service sites

Powerful branding and customization options

Built-in access management capabilities:

Role-based authorization

Different home pages for different scenarios

Public / restricted access

Optional SCI login

Built in features for translating the site, exporting and importing sites

Out-of-the-box usage analytics for hands-on site management

Seamless integration with SAP technology and solutions, including:

SAPUI5, Web IDE

SAP Success Factors

SAP Cloud for Customer

SAP Business Suite

SAP Fiori

Accelerators: boost site development and extensions with:

Gorgeous site templates ready for use

Full support for business scenarios such as support, marketing, HR

Additional sample content available on GitHub

Lively developer community in SAP Community Network

Rich user experience:

Responsive design for mobile use

Supports SAP Fiori launchpad

Cutting-edge design for predefined content and templates
